Text:
This is not the SACD part thats ripped (or it might be but downcoded), just regular CD quality.

Sample rate : 44100 Hz
Channels : 2
Bits per sample : 16

U cant rip SACD genius :)
But its still superb quality

note to everyone it is now possible to make exact digital coppies of sacd's(exept without the copy protection)on a PS3 using sacd-ripper.pkg you can select to export a iso image of the whole disc or extract 2ch or multi ch tracks as dsd or dsf. I will upload sacd-ripper.pkg along with scarletbook(used to exract tracks from image) and instructions in the next day or so or you can visit here 

http://www.ps3hax.net/2011/06/released-sacd-ripping-tool-for-ps3/

Music is fine, recordings are very clear, but if you're really into natural sounding recordings, the sound is a bit dated... Kind of an 80's/90's sound, very EQ'd and with an overly hyped high end.  I recommend this instead: 
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5564729/The_Nordic_Sound_-_2L_Audiophile_Reference_Recording_24bit_96khz
